title: Tiffany Haddish | Trump and Piers Morgan Clash; Rudy Giuliani Appears on The Masked Singer: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Piers Morgan debuting a trailer for an interview he claims Donald Trump angrily walked out of and Rudy Giuliani’s appearance on The Masked Singer.

Then, Tiffany Haddish talks about her dating requirements, her children’s book Layla, the Last Black Unicorn and the real reason she accepted her role in The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
